abstract: Australian man is hospitalized for more than month in serious condition after eating two garden slugs that harbored rat lung-worm parasite; ate slugs as a result of a dare.
snippet: The ingestion of a parasite called Angiostrongylus cantonensis, which can cause fatal brain swelling, was the result of a dare.
lead_paragraph: The ingestion of a parasite called Angiostrongylus cantonensis, which can cause fatal brain swelling, was the result of a dare.

headline.main: Australia: Man’s Serious Illness Shows the Danger of Daring to Eat a Garden-Variety Slug
headline.print_headline: Australia: Man’s Serious Illness Shows the Danger Of Daring to Eat a Garden-Variety Slug
headline.seo: Australian Man’s Illness Prompts Warning on Eating Slugs
